allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: use SSH remotes and remove --add flag in prezto setup

- Switch prezto and statusline remotes from HTTPS to SSH
- Remove --add flag to prevent duplicate URLs on re-run

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: make setup scripts idempotent

- Use ln -sf to force symlink creation \(overwrites existing\)
- Skip prezto clone if directory already exists
- Add || true to git remote add commands to ignore "already exists" errors

Setup can now be run multiple times without failing.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
